channel.title: What happens after you have died
channel.description: What do you guys think happens after you're dead? Do you reborn into a different creature, like a fly or something else :) Do you become a ghost and can float everywhere around without people seeing you. Do you go to a place like heaven/hell? And etc.. Btw, I'm not talking about what happens to your body, i'm talking about what happens to your soul, so no "You get burried and burned". Also, please don't spam the thread with useless comments like: "You respawn a lumbridge" blah blah blah. People who post such stuff think they're funny but they aren't. Discuss. :)

item.title: What happens after you have died
item.dc:creator: @leacher1197 leacher1197
item.description:
@leacher1197 wrote:

[quote=“B A R A G Ez™, post:118, topic:287293”]You turn into a ghost.[/quote] I don’t think so, I think thats only if you have unfinished buissness, Like taxes.

Read full topic

rip4d:

I find it impossible to think of complete nothingness.

item.title: What happens after you have died
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:106, topic:287293”][quote author=Bryanc link=topic=379885.msg2899669#msg2899669 date=1249432573]
Science is always there to save the day.

You die, rot in the ground (depending on your way of burial, etc). That’s it.

There is no god, everything can be explained in science, so I don’t get why people say there is a god. It’s just because you are told that, that you believe that.
[/quote]Wait a sec, how do you rot?
I’ve seen vids from morgues that they burn your body to dust. o.O[/quote]

Do you read at all? I clearly fucking put “(depending on your way of burial, etc)”, cremation would be a different method.

Read full topic
item.source: What happens after you have died

There is no god, everything can be explained in science, so I don’t get why people say there is a god. It’s just because you are told that, that you believe that.[/quote]Wait a sec, how do you rot?
I’ve seen vids from morgues that they burn your body to dust. o.O

item.title: What happens after you have died
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Lol’d
Well I guess your mind process doesn’t start until you are concieved. You don’t think as there was nothing for you to think with. Thus proving that before life may in fact be similar to death without a mindstate. But then I had the though of death being a non-existent high…
Anyways… I still believe in heaven/hell. My mom went to a psychic or whatever those people who contact the dead are called. They nailed every trait of my grandma, even down to the smoking in the bowling alley.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens after you have died
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:97, topic:287293”]Well I have a plausible question:
When you die, where is your mind state? Are you in paradise? Hell? Heaven? Or is it just nothing? No light, no sound, no life?
I think that’s the real question here.[/quote]

tbh i always think about that and its puzzling as fuck

Read full topic

item.title: What happens after you have died
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Science is always there to save the day.

You die, rot in the ground (depending on your way of burial, etc). That’s it.

There is no god, everything can be explained in science, so I don’t get why people say there is a god. It’s just because you are told that, that you believe that.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens after you have died
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

playerAction:

Believing this is just as ridiculous as believing in “God” or “reincarnation” or “hell” or “heaven”, you see?

Yea, but it is just a guess. I do not believe in it, I am just guessing what will happen. The most probable to happen is this:

dimmu borgir:

When you die, you cease to exist… nothing happens with you afterwards. No “divine forces” intervening, no “judgment”, no “souls”, nothing. You just die.

Read full topic
item.source: What happens after you have died
